definitions.definition: a part of the inside of a building that is separated from other parts by walls, floor, and ceiling:
examples: I like this room - it has plenty of light.

definitions.definition: used as a combining form in the names of particular rooms:
a set of rented rooms, especially in a college or university
to rent a room from someone, or share a rented room with someone:
examples: At college he rooms with this guy from Nebraska.
